sentence.Network_en: Hawke got up and walked obtrusively out of the building.
sentence.Network_cn: 霍克站了起来，大摇大摆地走出了大楼。

sentence.Network_en: He works imprudently and obtrusively, and is never a stable man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他做事情毛头毛脑的, 一点也不稳重.

list.abs: When Obtrusive一旦突出obtrusive light干扰光obtrusive saucy莽撞的
i find the music in the bar very obtrusive ., 我觉得酒吧里的音乐太吵人了.
" This is a very obtrusive lad ! " said Mr. Gradgrind , turning , and knitting his brows on him .“这真是一个非常冒失的孩子，”葛擂硬先生转过身来向他皱着眉头说。
The obtrusive behavior of a spoiled child ., 一个被宠坏的孩子的任意行为.

entry.tran: 过分突出的；（难看得）显眼的，扎眼的
entry.def: If you say that someone or something is obtrusive, you think they are noticeable in an unpleasant way.

example.ex: 'You are rude and obtrusive, Mr Galbraith,' said Tommy...
example.tran: “您粗暴无礼而且冒失莽撞，加尔布雷思先生，”汤米说道。

example.ex: These heaters are less obtrusive and are easy to store away in the summer.
example.tran: 这些加热器没那么碍眼，夏天收起来也很方便。
